ORIGAM Documentation : Screen Widgets

Created by Tomáš Vavrda, last modified on Oct 02, 2014

These are widgets that can be placed on a screen. These are typically Screen Sections themselves or different types of containers.

  • AsTree2
  • Collapsible Container
  • Panel
  • Split Panel
  • Tab Control
